list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: carry out a systematic or formal inquiry to discover and examine the facts of (an incident, allegation, etc.) so as to establish the truth.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: police are investigating the alleged beating
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cảnh sát đang điều tra bị cáo buộc đánh đập
